title: New LoL Client not opening
body: I updated the game a few days ago and it was working fine until now and the logo on my dock changed. I am using Macbook and on NA server could anyone help? Do i need to redownload the game?

replies.body:
Hmmm... does this still happen if you try one of the League launchers inside your League directory? To do this,you'll want to hop into your applications folder, then right click on League and select *Show package contents* then browse for launchable applications for League and give them a go.

Let me know what you find.

not the same guy but im running into the issue so i thought i would throw what i found at you. hope thats okay!

when attempting to open the client i get a RADS error telling me that it could not connect to HTTP server

http://prntscr.com/dao70g

this is the message i get

hope it helps

attempted to open up a different form of the launcher inside the directory. was told that i did not have a internet connection and that i needed to check it restart or shut down

http://prntscr.com/dao83b

attempted to run league of legends client (both of them) as administrator. same error messages
